channel.title: web-extension on Antomor
channel.description: Recent content in web-extension on Antomor

item.title: Browser Extension Development
item.description: Web extensions or browser plugins can be used to improve browser functionalities. The following examples summarize the different goals they can have: no-script - to block script served from not-trusted domains ublock Origin - it is “a wide-spectrum blocker” dark-mode - it changes the appearance of web pages React Developer Tools - to inspect react-specific properties of a page that makes use of React. Anatomy of an extension The main components of a browser extension are:
